scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && node -e "const {toolProfileSchema, toolProfileOpenApi}=require('./dist/index.js'); const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const {zodToJsonSchema}=require('zod-to-json-schema'); fs.writeFileSync(path.join(process.cwd(),'../..','toolProfile.schema.json'), JSON.stringify(zodToJsonSchema(toolProfileSchema, 'ToolProfile', { name: 'ToolProfile' }), null, 2)); fs.writeFileSync(path.join(process.cwd(),'../..','openapi.json'), JSON.stringify(toolProfileOpenApi(), null, 2)); console.log('Wrote toolProfile.schema.json and openapi.json');"
